item.description:
This is a group for women to renew your commitment to yourself and to living a joyful, more meaningful life. Topics: saying no, setting limits, and saying YES to YOU...choosing friendships that nourish, renewing passion, taking the risk to grow, setting goals and dreams. Receive a workbook and guide, ongoing email support, a 30 -min. private coaching session, free ticket to Woman's Day of Inspiration.
   Five Tuesdays, beginning April 24, 7-8:30 pm. $250 (sign up before April 13 and get $50 off) Register:  http://julie@thejoysource.com.
item.name: The Joy Course with Julie Mcgrath
